name: Type or Die
description:
Type Or Die: The complete space typing simulator! Defend your ship from the onslaught using powerful typing attacks!

Features:

  • Cutting edge graphics and sound.
  • Realistic keyboard physics.
  • Accurate RSI modelling.
  • Supports multiple keyboard layouts, QWERTY, DVORAK and more.
  • Support for mechanical and electronic keyboards.
  • Huge vocabulary of words.
  • Dynamic phrase generation.

Type Or Die is an open-source game, you can find the source here.
